publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-2.3 Brian Monteith: As an Amendment to the Motion in the name of Mr Jim Wallace leave out from "the" in line 2 to end and insert: "and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce a scholarship scheme which funds in full the tuition fees of Scottish domiciled students studying at higher education institutions anywhere in the United Kingdom" (lodged on 19 May 1999). Supported by: David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, David Davidson, Ben Wallace, Phil Gallie

S1M-2.3 Brian Monteith: As an amendment to the motion in the name of Mr Jim Wallace (S1M-2), leave out from "the" in line 2 to end and insert: "and calls upon the Scottish Executive to introduce a scholarship scheme which funds in full the tuition fees of Scottish domiciled students studying at higher education institutions anywhere in the United Kingdom" (lodged on 19 May 1999). Supported by: David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, David Davidson, Ben Wallace, Phil Gallie
